name: Skelegeon Online
description: Skelegeon, this was one of my Halloween side projects. You know you just gotta do something for Halloween. I originally really wanted to make a 42 kilobyte NES game. But as you can see it did not turn out as a 42 kilobyte NES game. I WOULD STRONGLY RECOMMEND A CONTROLLER TO PLAY. This game will get really difficult if you don't have a controller. Some things may look useless in the game like candy, but I made this game for kids to play on Halloween. So they can when actual candy when playing the game. You don't have to do that but I guess you can if you want to. This game is also procedural generated, so if something happens in a glitch, which I think I covered most of them, you can just hit the reload button on your keyboard.
